attributes.action: Officially change the name of London to 'Brown Town' in honour of the Prime Minister.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned believe that it is high time that the city of London rids itself of its out-dated name of 'London', and declares its allegiance to the modern world by renaming the glorious city with the contempory and understated name of 'Brown Town'. Not only will this name bring more economic development to the city by making it more recognisable to a) businesses and b) tourists, but pays homage to the brave British freedom fighter, Gordon Brown.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
